trans-unit.source: A persistence command that lets you save instance state information into the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您將執行個體的狀態資訊儲存至持續性存放區的持續性命令。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Sets the status of the instance in the persistence database to "Completed" and deletes the state information from the database unless the <see cref="P:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction" /> property is set to "Delete Nothing".
trans-unit.target: 將持續性資料庫中的執行個體狀態設定為「已完成」，除非 <see cref="P:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction" /> 屬性設定為「全部不刪除」，否則從資料庫刪除狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the status of the instance is "Completed" and the state information is deleted; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果執行個體的狀態為 「 已完成 」，以及狀態資訊會刪除;否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance data to be saved into the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 取得要儲存至持續性存放區的執行個體資料。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains names of properties and their values.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性名稱及其值的字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary that contains names of properties and their values.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性名稱及其值的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary with an instance key as the key and a dictionary of XName and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue" /> pairs as the value.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用執行個體索引鍵做為索引鍵、Xname 字典和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue" /> 組做為值的字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionaries with key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 包含索引鍵/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Contains instance keys that must be associated with an instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含必須與執行個體相關聯的執行個體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains a GUID associated with an instance key and metadata associated with the instance key.
trans-unit.target: 包含與執行個體索引鍵相關聯之 GUID 以及與執行個體索引鍵相關聯之中繼資料的字典。

trans-unit.source: The instance keys that must be associated with an instance.
trans-unit.target: 必須與執行個體相關聯的執行個體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of instance keys that must be disassociated with an instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得必須與執行個體解除關聯的執行個體索引鍵集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of instance keys that must be disassociated with an instance.
trans-unit.target: 必須與執行個體解除關聯的執行個體索引鍵集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of instance keys to be deleted from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 取得要從持續性存放區刪除的執行個體索引鍵集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of instance keys to be deleted from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 要從持續性存放區刪除的執行個體索引鍵集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains changes to instance metadata.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含執行個體中繼資料之變更的字典。

trans-unit.source: The changes to instance metadata.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體中繼資料之變更。

trans-unit.source: Removes the lock on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 移除執行個體上的鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Sets the lock owner to <see langword="null" /> for an instance.
trans-unit.target: 將執行個體的鎖定擁有人設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the lock is removed on an instance; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體上的鎖定已移除，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
